description:
The magic of Capilene is its ability to wick moisture and dry fast. With a smooth outer surface, the fabric of slides under your top layers, and an open-grid pattern on the back holds warmth near your skin. This thermal-weight option is ready for the coldest conditions.

  • Polartec® Power Grid® fabric is warm, breathable and wicking
  • HeiQ® Pure odour treatment keeps you fresh
  • Offset shoulder seams eliminate chafing under pack straps
  • Underarm gusset for range of motion
name: Patagonia Long-Sleeved Capilene Thermal Weight Crew - Women's
